common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: you can turn on or turn off your app push config setting through this open api

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: this callback_url is invalid, please check your callback_url.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Your app's callback_url is empty, please input a callback_url before you turn on push config.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The call back url can not be Shopee intranet address, please change another new call back url

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Shopee have sent a test push to this call back url, but we didn't get any response in 3 seconds with 2xx code, please check your service.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Shopee have sent a test push to this call back url, the response code we get from this callback_url is not 2xx code, please check your service.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The callback url of push mechanism. It is the address where the Shopee will send the push message to. If you don't set any callback_url before, this parameters is required.

","name":"callback_url","sample":"https://open.shopee.com/","type":"string","required":"False","key":"WPPCYra"},{"description":"

Turn on push config, Shopee will send the push message into the callback url.

1=Shop authorization for partners

2=Shop deauthorization for partners

3=Order status update push

4=TrackingNo push

5=Shopee Updates

6=Banned item push

7=item promotion push

8=reserved stock change push

9=promotionn update push

10=webchat push

11=video upload push

12=openapi authorization expiry push

13=brand register result

","name":"set_push_config_on","sample":"[1,2,3,4,5,8,9,10]","type":"int[]","required":"False","key":"nEbxkxx"},{"description":"

Turn off Push config, Shopee won't send the push message into the callback url.

1=Shop authorization for partners

2=Shop deauthorization for partners

3=Order status update push

4=TrackingNo push

5=Shopee Updates

6=Banned item push

7=item promotion push

8=reserved stock change push

9=promotionn update push

10=webchat push

11=video upload push

12=openapi authorization expiry push

13=brand register result

","name":"set_push_config_off","sample":"[6,7,11,12,13]","type":"int[]","required":"False","key":"tWJJQbK"},{"description":"

Use this filed to set shops that need to be blocked.Please input no more than 500 shop id.

","name":"blocked_shop_id_list","sample":"[10010,20020,30030]","type":"int[]","required":"False","key":"RhYsNwX"}],"response_params":[{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"mXhkrjD"},{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"common.error_auth","type":"string","required":null,"key":"AtMQiQz"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Invalid sign","type":"string","required":null,"key":"xsXNFXH"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"azQMmkh","children":[{"description":"

Use this field to indicate whether the configuration is set successfully.

","name":"result","sample":"success","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jBTQdA"}]}]}

[{"type":"Payload","value":"{
	"callback_url": "https://open.shopee.com/",

	],

		10010,
		20020,
		30030
	]
}"},{"type":"Java","value":"Unirest.setTimeouts(0, 0);
HttpResponse<String> response = Unirest.post("https://partner.uat.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/push/set_app_push_config?partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp")
.header("Content-Type","application/json")
.body("{
   \"blocked_shop_id_list\": [
      10010,
      20020,
      30030
   ],
   \"callback_url\": \"https://open.shopee.com/\",
   \"set_push_config_off\": [
      6,
      7,
      11,
      12,
      13
   ],
   \"set_push_config_on\": [
      1,
      2,
      3,
      4,
      5,
      8,
      9,
      10
   ]
}")
.asString();"},{"type":"PHP","value":"<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.uat.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/push/set_app_push_config?partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "blocked_shop_id_list": [
        10010,
        20020,
        30030
    ],
    "callback_url": "https://open.shopee.com/",
    "set_push_config_off": [
        6,
        7,
        11,
        12,
        13
    ],
    "set_push_config_on": [
        1,
        2,
        3,
        4,
        5,
        8,
        9,
        10
    ]
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;
"},{"type":"cURL","value":"curl --location --request POST 'https://partner.uat.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/push/set_app_push_config?partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp' \

--data-raw '{

"},{"type":"Python","value":"import requests
import json

url = "https://partner.uat.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/push/set_app_push_config?partner_id=partner_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp"

payload=json.dumps({
  "blocked_shop_id_list": [
    10010,
    20020,
    30030
  ],
  "callback_url": "https://open.shopee.com/",
  "set_push_config_off": [
    6,
    7,
    11,
    12,
    13
  ],
  "set_push_config_on": [
    1,
    2,
    3,
    4,
    5,
    8,
    9,
    10
  ]
})
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json'
}
response = requests.request("POST",url,headers=headers, data=payload, allow_redirects=False)

print(response.text)
"}]
